name: t05_fptr_callbacks
description: Function-pointer dispatch tables and callback chains across TUs. Forces oracle_dwarf to resolve indirect call targets and track DW_TAG_pointer_type â†’ DW_TAG_subroutine_type chains.
oracle_pressure: Indirect calls via function-pointer tables produce no direct DW_AT_call_target. Oracle must correlate DW_TAG_pointer_type with DW_TAG_subroutine_type to reconstruct possible call edges.
